author: Georgia Billing
description: A twist of the classic Vieux Carré with scotch substituting rye whiskey and cherry wine in place of vermouth. The bitter balance is provided by aromatised wine.
name: The Cheshire Cat
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Punt E Mes or other full-bodied vermouth

recipeInstructions.text: THROW all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of ice block)

video.description: A twist of the classic Vieux Carré with scotch substituting rye whiskey and cherry wine in place of vermouth. The bitter balance is provided by aromatised wine.
video.name: HOWTO make The Cheshire Cat
